GULF OF GUINEA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 02-34N 002-53E AT 041035 DEC.
   VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS
   POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER,

   AND TO MDAT-GOG, PHONE: 332 9822 8888,

2. CANCEL THIS MSG 111200Z DEC 20.
